issue.title: Request Model does not check filename sanity + does not store displayName
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Request Model (class Easysdi_shopModelRequest) @saveproduct()@:
* does not check filename sanity
** I propose to move @getCleanFilename@ from extract to the helper to reuse it
* does not store displayName
** Store the cleaned filename

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
